pullRequest.title: Fix NullPointerException in VideoPlayer
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose / Description
#5911 raised an unexpected error in VideoPlayer, we log to see how this happened, and attempt to fix it
Fixes
Fixes #5911
Approach
Null check & Logging
How Has This Been Tested?
Couldn't reproduce or logically reason through how it happened. 🛑
Checklist

 You have not changed whitespace unnecessarily (it makes diffs hard to read)
 You have a descriptive commit message with a short title (first line, max 50 chars).
 Your code follows the style of the project (e.g. never omit braces in if statements)
 You have commented your code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
 You have performed a self-review of your own code

commit.message:
NF: VideoPlayer - improve logging

This is to diagnose #5911

VideoPlayer - fix NullPointerException

Got an unexpected crash report: #5911, which doesn't seem possible.
Despite this, we should be able to turn this into an error & non-crash.

nodes.bodyText: Flagging for review, wasn't sure how to do this via ACRA as we don't have an exception.

commit.message: Review: Added Diagnostic report to AnkiDroidApp

nodes.bodyText: Issue found: JUnit tests should include assert() or fail()
Issue found: JUnit tests should include assert() or fail()
